column5: Can any one give me any information on moose hunting in the Cochrane, Ontario area {Cochrane Air) Thanks
[font color=green size=3][b] One point is that moose (meat, capes,ect.) can't come across the border until the "mad cow" thing is lifted. This may ruin the hunt this year. :(
That is going to hurt a lot of resorts if the moosehunters cancel. That's a substantial amount of revenue for resorts and guides in the fall.
